languages.text: "Как же изранена его душа... Все утонуло в серых и синих язвах вины, и они стремительно ширятся. Последний серебристый островок надежды вот-вот угаснет".

traits.locale_text: "Как же изранена его душа... Все утонуло в серых и синих язвах вины, и они стремительно ширятся. Последний серебристый островок надежды вот-вот угаснет".

languages.text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."
languages.original_text: "Как же изранена его душа... Все утонуло в серых и синих язвах вины, и они стремительно ширятся. Последний серебристый островок надежды вот-вот угаснет".

"His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

languages.text: «Su alma está terriblemente herida... Casi se ha hundido bajo las ampollas grises y azules de la culpa, que se hinchan cada vez más rápido. La última chispa de esperanza podría desvanecerse en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

traits.locale_text: «Su alma está terriblemente herida... Casi se ha hundido bajo las ampollas grises y azules de la culpa, que se hinchan cada vez más rápido. La última chispa de esperanza podría desvanecerse en cualquier momento».

languages.text: 「彼の魂はひどく傷ついている…まるで罪の意識の灰青色の水ぶくれの下に沈んでしまったかのように。それらはますます膨れ上がり、最後の銀色の希望のかけらも、今にも消えてしまいそうです」
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の魂はひどく傷ついている…まるで罪の意識の灰青色の水ぶくれの下に沈んでしまったかのように。それらはますます膨れ上がり、最後の銀色の希望のかけらも、今にも消えてしまいそうです」

languages.text: “他的灵魂承受了如此可怕的创伤……几乎完全沉浸在内疚的灰蓝色水疱之下。那些水疱膨胀得如此迅速，最后一丝希望随时可能会熄灭。”
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

traits.locale_text: “他的灵魂承受了如此可怕的创伤……几乎完全沉浸在内疚的灰蓝色水疱之下。那些水疱膨胀得如此迅速，最后一丝希望随时可能会熄灭。”

languages.text: "Seine Seele ist schrecklich verletzt ... Sie ist in den grau-blauen Blasen der Schuld versunken, die immer mehr anschwellen. Der letzte Funke Hoffnung könnte jederzeit schwinden."
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Seele ist schrecklich verletzt ... Sie ist in den grau-blauen Blasen der Schuld versunken, die immer mehr anschwellen. Der letzte Funke Hoffnung könnte jederzeit schwinden."

languages.text: « Son âme est atrocement meurtrie... Elle est accablée par les cloques bleu-gris de la culpabilité, qui enflent à une vitesse fulgurante. La dernière lueur argentine d'espoir qui y demeure pourrait disparaître à tout instant. »
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."

traits.locale_text: « Son âme est atrocement meurtrie... Elle est accablée par les cloques bleu-gris de la culpabilité, qui enflent à une vitesse fulgurante. La dernière lueur argentine d'espoir qui y demeure pourrait disparaître à tout instant. »

languages.text: "Muazzam derecede yaralı bir ruhu var... Tüm yaraları, griye çalan mavi suçluluk kabarcıklarının altına gömülmüş. Bu kabarcıklar ki süratle şişip duruyor. Son gümüşi umut zerresi, her an solup gidebilir."
languages.original_text: "His is such a terribly wounded soul... It has all but sunk beneath the grey-blue blisters of guilt, and they are swelling ever so rapidly. The last silvery speck of hope could fade at any moment."
